value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|First things first. I summoned you here
with the divine Breidablik. That's the
name of this relic I've brought.$k$pIt fires something out of it, according
to legend, but Breidablik doesn't
look like any bow I've ever seen.$k$pThe legend also calls it "the true key,"
which, if raised high, will summon
the Great Hero who can fire it.$k$p$EFace_Smile|That's what I did. And now you're
here. So it's all yours now. Hopefully
you can figure out how to—$k$p$WmMEID_アクスファイター,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|THERE SHE IS! GET HER!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Drat. More of those Emblian soldiers.
I can't defeat them all by myself,
and you're not equipped to help me.$k$p$EFace_Cool|You run while I hold them off. Take
Breidablik and get out of here,
$Nu!$k$p$Sbs500|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$EFace_Anger|What's that?! That bright light,
coming from...$k

$WmMPID_タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm Takumi, a prince of Hoshido and
wielder of the divine Fujin Yumi. Which
makes me pretty useful, I'd say.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|How'd you do that? You summoned
a Hero, $Nu!$k$pYou just picked up Breidablik, and
you're already able to use it!$k$p$EFace_Anger|But there's no time to chat now.
This Takumi and I need to get to
fighting.$k$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$SspVOICE_TUTORIAL_G|When using a bow, you must keep
space between you and your foe.$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|My special skill, Night Sky, is ready
to use! It activates after I take a
certain number of actions in a fight.$k$p$EFace_Cool|After my special skill is ready, I use
it when I next fight someone.
So, now...attack!$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|We won! And it's all thanks to you,
$Nu.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Why, none of us in the Order of
Heroes can actually summon
these Heroes.$k$p$EFace|Ha! I never doubted for a second that
you were the Great Hero. You're the
one who will save our kingdom.$k$pOur order is small, Summoner, but
welcome to our ranks. Please, help us
find more Heroes to assist us.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Now that you're here, I just know that
we'll win our fight against the empire,
$Nu.$k$Sbs150|

Bows can be used to attack foes two
spaces away or diagonally. They can't
target foes in adjacent spaces.

Drag your ally over a foe to attack!
You can attack any red space.

Drag your ally over a foe to attack!
You can attack any red space.
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I'll finish them off! It's time to attack!$k
